content:
Sorry for the tangentially relevant comment, but: I don't mind reading raw LaTeX, but here's another vote for prioritizing "Mark messages as read on scroll" support in the Flutter app.

Edit: I should also add that, other than this very specific omission, the new app is much much better than the current one. Thank you developers!
A message was moved here from #Zulip meta > LaTeX display in mobile app by Kevin Buzzard.

I don't want to clog up the LaTeX discussion because this is tangential, but FWIW this is the main reason why I have not switched to the beta app. I'm subscribed to all channels here, and the fact that I have to continually mark messages as read manually makes the beta app very tedious for me to use -- I am manually marking hundreds if not thousands of messages as read every day.

Thanks @Mauricio Collares and @Kevin Buzzard! This is https://github.com/zulip/zulip-flutter/issues/81 in our tracker.

I've noted your requests there and in the Zulip development community, here: https://chat.zulip.org/#narrow/channel/48-mobile/topic/marking.20read/near/2018451
